name: Rynda
description: I've been searching and traveling. Let's go home, together.

passiveSkill.name: Morning Star
passiveSkill.description: ${d.lens5.skill ? d.lens5.skill : "A lost traveler gives a sincere gift to her cherished partner. When Rynda joins the battle, increases DMG Rate and DMG RES Rate by {placeholder} for all partners in hand. Light partners get an extra {placeholder}. Cannot be stacked."}

uniqueSkill.name: Lion Roar
uniqueSkill.description: ${d.lens4.skill ? d.lens4.skill : "When Rynda is on the front row, mechanical box transforms into a protective arm, granting a shield with {placeholder} of Rynda's ATK to Rynda and the ally directly behind her. Reduces AOE DMG taken by {placeholder} for 2 rounds.When Rynda is on the middle row, mechanical box transforms into a cannon, dealing ATK*{placeholder} damage to a column of enemies. Every enemy killed restores {placeholder}Rage for Rynda and Leader.When Rynda is in the back row, mechanical box creates 2 robobirds with {placeholder} of Rynda's ATK and {placeholder} of her HP. Deals true damage (ignores DEF, Block and DMG RES Rate) and orders all robobirds to attack."}

specialSkill.name: Tin Blow
specialSkill.description: ${d.lens6.skill ? d.lens6.skill : "Rynda strikes with her hammer, dealing ATK*{placeholder} damage to an enemy. Increases DMG Rate and DMG RES Rate by {placeholder} for all partners in hand (up to 3 stacks).Skill Cast Rate: {placeholder}"}

normalSkill.name: Straw Dance
normalSkill.description: Attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage.
